bug.summary: If alluxio.master.hostname config to localhost will not work, but ip can work well.
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: master Describe the bug If alluxio.master.hostname config to localhost will not work, but ip can work well. To Reproduce
alluxio-site.properties
<denchmark-code>alluxio.master.hostname=localhost </denchmark-code>
execute alluxio shell
bin/alluxio fs ls alluxio://localhost:19998/ Failed to connect to FileSystemMasterClient @ localhost:19998 after 8 attempts
bin/alluxio fs ls / Failed to connect to FileSystemMasterClient @ localhost:19998 after 8 attempts
alluxio-site.properties
<denchmark-code>alluxio.master.hostname=192.168.1.200 </denchmark-code>
execute alluxio shell
bin/alluxio fs ls alluxio://192.168.1.200:19998/ drwxr-xr-x mbl staff 0 NOT_PERSISTED 10-23-2019 09:48:11:321 DIR /abc Expected behavior Each of above test should be successful. Urgency Describe the impact and urgency of the bug. Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.
